body.section: Hierarchy SocialHistoryConcern is a kind of HealthConcern

section.title: Description
section.p: Subjective patient supplied information that addresses occupational and recreational aspects of the patient's personal life that have the potential to be clinically significant such as sexual history, smoking history and alcohol consumption.

stentry.p: Identifies the Problem or Health Concern being described. Note that this healthConcern property in this SocialHistory class is re-defining the healthConcern in the HealthConcern supertype to use a subset of possible values specific to Social History concerns, such as smoking, etc.
"Identifies the problem. This is the identifier from an institution's master list of problems." - HL7 Version 2.8, PRB-3
